ij.gui

Class PointRoi

  • java.lang.Object
    • ij.gui.Roi
      • ij.gui.PolygonRoi
        • ij.gui.PointRoi
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<Point>

    public class PointRoi
extends PolygonRoi
    This class represents a collection of points.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
